Title: Increases criminal penalties for aggravated harassment of an elected official and criminal trespass of an elected official's residence
Summary: Increases criminal penalties for aggravated harassment of an elected official and criminal trespass of an elected official's residence; provides that aggravated harassment of an elected official shall be a class E felony and criminal trespass of an elected official's residence shall be included in criminal trespass in the first degree and shall be a class D felony.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to increasing criminal penalties for aggravated harassment of an elected official and criminal trespass of an elected official's residence
